kw.name: Create Session
kw.msg: Creating Session using : alias=employee_api, url=http://localhost:8000, headers={}, cookies={}, auth=None, timeout=None, proxies=None, verify=True, debug=0
kw.doc: Create Session: create a HTTP session to a server

kw.name: Open Browser
kw.msg: Applicable driver not found; attempting to install with Selenium Manager (Beta)

kw.name: Maximize Browser Window
kw.doc: Maximizes current browser window.

kw.name: Name
kw.doc: :example: 'John Doe'

kw.name: Create Dictionary
kw.msg: &{employee} = { name=Timothy Williams | department=Physiological scientist | position=Health and safety inspector }
kw.doc: Creates and returns a dictionary based on the given ``items``.

kw.name: POST On Session
kw.msg: POST Request : url=http://localhost:8000/employees/ path_url=/employees/ headers={'User-Agent': 'python-requests/2.32.3', 'Accept-Encoding': 'gzip, deflate, zstd', 'Accept': '*/*', 'Connection': 'keep-alive', 'Content-Length': '112', 'Content-Type': 'application/json'} body=b'{"name": "Timothy Williams", "department": "Physiological scientist", "position": "Health and safety inspector"}'
kw.doc: Sends a POST request on a previously created HTTP Session.

kw.doc: Fails if response status code is different than the expected.

kw.doc: Fails if objects are unequal after converting them to strings.
